lines.text: If you're going to shoot... shoot, but don't talk me to death.
Your office was completely destroyed.
Well at least I won't have to go to work today. I hated that damn wallpaper anyway.
You've destroyed our entire way of life.
Well, I can only hope.
The waiter suggests the Mako... that's shark.
Oh, I never eat shark. Call it professional courtesy.
Don't buy a new hat because I'm going to tear your head off!
I don't want him setting foot in this house unless he's buried in the basement!
Sorry I had to be nice to you.
I may never recover.
Are you comfortable Angela? Can I get you anything? Maybe you'd like an arsenic on the rocks.
She and nothing else around here will ever be the same again!
Angela declared war on me before I even set foot in this valley. I'll tell you what I want. I want her head, and Chase's along side it!

[discussing Richard with Father Bob]
How can I love the baby I lost and hate the man he's become?

[sees Richard and Maggie kissing at Chase's memorial service]
How sweet. Sharing your memories of Chase?

[barging into Richard's office]
Don't you ever read your rag?
Don't you ever knock?
I want to apologize, I'm just not quite sure how to do it...
What's wrong with 'I'm sorry'?
